template.name: Scheduler

transition.label: i:id_t, j:m_t
is_observing_c(j,i) && x[j] == running[j].max
move!
tmp_i = i, active_c[j] = -1, tmp_seg = running[j], running_remove(j)
i:id_t, j:m_t
is_observing_c(j,i) && x[j] >= running[j].min
tmp_i = i, active_c[j] = -1, tmp_seg = running[j], running_remove(j)

template.name: Task

query.formula: E<> exists(i : id_t) Task(i).Active && tp > Task(i).deadline()
